specials_info:
Magic Mouth Riddle:

 Name the one of cold,
 foretold twofold.

; Answer: STONE GOLEM
 Teleports you to 8N 9E

Magic Mouth Riddle:

 Name the endless bypass and your path shall be guaranteed.

 Answer: SINISTER
 Opens the door at 6N 1E
Crystal Golem: The CRYSTAL SWORD is the only weapon that beats this guardian.

Kylearan
Important item: ONYX KEY to unlock Mangar's Tower (not he gates!)
